name: Astro Dodger
description:
This game is about dodging asteroids and collecting stars! Collect starts to unlock the ability to fade out of existance for a few seconds and with even more stars you unlock the ability to fire your cannons at the asteroids! Use these abilities to stay alive, the asteroid intensity increases each minute.

There is currently no high score chart for the PC version, that might be added in the future.

If you experience any stuttering or lag in the browser version then please get the exe file and run that instead!

The windows and android version is currently one version ahead of the web version, this is due to a technical issue and will hopefully be resolved in the future.

Have fun out there!
